thread.section_title: Hotel Residence Foch - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: nice little Parisian hotel
thread.title_full: nice little Parisian hotel - Review of Hotel Residence Foch, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Chizuko M
title: nice little Parisian hotel
text:
A small, yet very charming and comfortable hotel on a quiet side street in 16th arrondissment. The front lady Isabelle is very friendly and accommodating.
she let us get in our room hours ahead of the check-in time which we very much appreciated after a long flight across the Atlantic.
It is not surrounded by many shops and you have to walk 10 minutes to a Metro station.
Room Tip: Ask for a room away from an elevator. See more room tips
